meanings.sent1: The unprized painting was left in the corner, unnoticed by most visitors.
meanings.sent2: The old, unprized book sat dusty on the shelf, forgotten by many.
meanings.sent3: Despite its unprized status, the quirky mug became the favorite in the office.
meanings.sent4: Her unprized talent for storytelling finally caught the attention of the audience.
meanings.sent5: The unprized gem sparkled in the sunlight, revealing its hidden beauty.

meanings.sent1: The unprized necklace was lost among the other jewelry in the box.
meanings.sent2: The unprized toy was left behind as the child ran off to play with a new one.
meanings.sent3: The unprized teddy bear found a new home with a child who loved it dearly.
meanings.sent4: Her unprized friendship meant more to him than any material possession.
meanings.sent5: The unprized memories of their adventures together brought a smile to her face.
